alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:26PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Elko County through 515 PM PDT... At 425 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 27 miles southwest of Oakley Reservoir, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Montello, Contact and Hd Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
